languages.text: "С дороги!" {n}Растолкав зевак локтями, к вам прорывается богато одетая дама с мушкой-аугментацией над губой.{/n} "Почтенн{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа}, мой восьмой отпрыск сошел с ума! Он решил отринуть семью, дворянский титул и свой талант врачевателя ради какой-то оборванки со средних уровней! Союз с простолюдинкой не позволит ему продолжить обучение в университете, но разве Даргонус и Официо Медике должны лишиться умелого хирургеона ради мимолетного увлечения?"

traits.locale_text: "С дороги!" {n}Растолкав зевак локтями, к вам прорывается богато одетая дама с мушкой-аугментацией над губой.{/n} "Почтенн{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа}, мой восьмой отпрыск сошел с ума! Он решил отринуть семью, дворянский титул и свой талант врачевателя ради какой-то оборванки со средних уровней! Союз с простолюдинкой не позволит ему продолжить обучение в университете, но разве Даргонус и Официо Медике должны лишиться умелого хирургиона ради мимолетного увлечения?"
traits.speaker: AdministratumStrangeNobleLady

languages.text: "Out of my way!" {n}Elbowing aside onlookers left and right, a richly dressed lady with a beauty mark augment above her lip charges toward you.{/n} "Esteemed {mf|lord|lady}, my eighth offspring has lost his mind! He has decided to renounce his family, his noble title, and his talent as a healer, all for the sake of some tattered waif from the middle levels! A union with a commoner will put an end to his studies at the university — but should Dargonus and the Officio Medicae be deprived of a capable chirurgeon because of a passing fancy?"
languages.original_text: "С дороги!" {n}Растолкав зевак локтями, к вам прорывается богато одетая дама с мушкой-аугментацией над губой.{/n} "Почтенн{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа}, мой восьмой отпрыск сошел с ума! Он решил отринуть семью, дворянский титул и свой талант врачевателя ради какой-то оборванки со средних уровней! Союз с простолюдинкой не позволит ему продолжить обучение в университете, но разве Даргонус и Официо Медике должны лишиться умелого хирургеона ради мимолетного увлечения?"

languages.text: “都给我让开！”{n}一位衣着华丽的女士把左右的围观者推开，朝你冲了过来。她的嘴唇上面有颗美人痣。{/n}“尊贵的大人，我的第八个儿子发了疯！他打算放弃他的家庭地位、贵族头衔与身为治疗师的天赋，一门心思要和某个来自中产阶层的姑娘结婚！如果他真的与一介平民结了婚，就没办法继续完成大学的学业了。难道达戈努斯的医疗机构，真的要因为我儿子一时心血来潮，失去一位前途似锦的外科医师吗？”
languages.original_text: "Out of my way!" {n}Elbowing aside onlookers left and right, a richly dressed lady with a beauty mark augment above her lip charges toward you.{/n} "Esteemed {mf|lord|lady}, my eighth offspring has lost his mind! He has decided to renounce his family, his noble title, and his talent as a healer, all for the sake of some tattered waif from the middle levels! A union with a commoner will put an end to his studies at the university — but should Dargonus and the Officio Medicae be deprived of a capable chirurgeon because of a passing fancy?"

traits.locale_text: “都给我让开！”{n}一位衣着华丽的女士把左右的围观者推开，朝你冲了过来。她的嘴唇上面有颗美人痣。{/n}“尊贵的大人，我的第八个儿子发了疯！他打算放弃他的家庭地位、贵族头衔与身为治疗师的天赋，一门心思要和某个来自中产阶层的姑娘结婚！如果他真的与一介平民结了婚，就没办法继续完成大学的学业了。难道达戈努斯的医疗机构，真的要因为我儿子一时心血来潮，失去一位前途似锦的外科医师吗？”
traits.speaker: AdministratumStrangeNobleLady

languages.text: «¡Fuera de mi camino!». {n}Repartiendo codazos al resto de solicitantes, una señora de ropa cara y con un lunar aumentado sobre el labio carga hacia ti.{/n} «¡Estimad{mf|o|a} señor{mf||a}, mi octavo descendiente ha sucumbido a la locura! Ha decidido renunciar a su familia, a su título noble y a su talento como curandero, ¡y todo por una moza harapienta de los niveles medios! Una unión con una plebeya pondría fin a sus estudios en la universidad, pero ¿es aceptable acaso que Dargonus y el Officio Medicae pierdan a un cirujano de talento por un mero capricho?».
languages.original_text: "Out of my way!" {n}Elbowing aside onlookers left and right, a richly dressed lady with a beauty mark augment above her lip charges toward you.{/n} "Esteemed {mf|lord|lady}, my eighth offspring has lost his mind! He has decided to renounce his family, his noble title, and his talent as a healer, all for the sake of some tattered waif from the middle levels! A union with a commoner will put an end to his studies at the university — but should Dargonus and the Officio Medicae be deprived of a capable chirurgeon because of a passing fancy?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Fuera de mi camino!». {n}Repartiendo codazos al resto de solicitantes, una señora de ropa cara y con un lunar aumentado sobre el labio carga hacia ti.{/n} «¡Estimad{mf|o|a} señor{mf||a}, mi octavo descendiente ha sucumbido a la locura! Ha decidido renunciar a su familia, a su título noble y a su talento como curandero, ¡y todo por una moza harapienta de los niveles medios! Una unión con una plebeya pondría fin a sus estudios en la universidad, pero ¿es aceptable acaso que Dargonus y el Officio Medicae pierdan a un cirujano de talento por un mero capricho?».
traits.speaker: AdministratumStrangeNobleLady

languages.text: 「どきなさいよ！」{n}美しいマークのオーギュメントを唇の上につけ、高級そうな服を着た女性が見物人を右へ左へと肘で押しのけながらこちらへ向かってくる。{/n}「陛下、私の8番目の子はおかしくなってしまったんです！家族も、貴族の肩書きも、治療師としての才能も捨てて、すべてを中層のみすぼらしい浮浪児のために捧げると決めてしまって！庶民と和合するなんて、あの子の大学での学業はもうお終いです。ダルゴナスとメディケア局は、一時の気まぐれのために優秀なチラージョンを失ってもいいとお考えなので？」
languages.original_text: "Out of my way!" {n}Elbowing aside onlookers left and right, a richly dressed lady with a beauty mark augment above her lip charges toward you.{/n} "Esteemed {mf|lord|lady}, my eighth offspring has lost his mind! He has decided to renounce his family, his noble title, and his talent as a healer, all for the sake of some tattered waif from the middle levels! A union with a commoner will put an end to his studies at the university — but should Dargonus and the Officio Medicae be deprived of a capable chirurgeon because of a passing fancy?"

traits.locale_text: 「どきなさいよ！」{n}美しいマークのオーギュメントを唇の上につけ、高級そうな服を着た女性が見物人を右へ左へと肘で押しのけながらこちらへ向かってくる。{/n}「陛下、私の8番目の子はおかしくなってしまったんです！家族も、貴族の肩書きも、治療師としての才能も捨てて、すべてを中層のみすぼらしい浮浪児のために捧げると決めてしまって！庶民と和合するなんて、あの子の大学での学業はもうお終いです。ダルゴナスとメディケア局は、一時の気まぐれのために優秀なチラージョンを失ってもいいとお考えなので？」
traits.speaker: AdministratumStrangeNobleLady

languages.text: « Hors de mon chemin ! » {n}Une femme richement vêtue, portant un grain de beauté artificiel au-dessus de la bouche, joue des coudes pour se frayer un chemin jusqu'à vous à travers la foule.{/n} « Noble {mf|seigneur|dame}, veuillez excuser ce jeune freluquet. Mon huitième fils ne sait plus ce qu'il dit ! Il a décidé de renoncer à sa famille, à son titre de noblesse et à ses talents de guérisseur, tout ça parce qu'il s'est entiché d'une souillon des niveaux intermédiaires ! Une union avec une roturière sonnerait le glas de ses études universitaires, mais je vous le demande un peu : Dargonus et l'Officio Medicae doivent-ils être privés d'un brillant chirurgeon pour une vulgaire amourette sans lendemain ? »
languages.original_text: "Out of my way!" {n}Elbowing aside onlookers left and right, a richly dressed lady with a beauty mark augment above her lip charges toward you.{/n} "Esteemed {mf|lord|lady}, my eighth offspring has lost his mind! He has decided to renounce his family, his noble title, and his talent as a healer, all for the sake of some tattered waif from the middle levels! A union with a commoner will put an end to his studies at the university — but should Dargonus and the Officio Medicae be deprived of a capable chirurgeon because of a passing fancy?"

traits.locale_text: « Hors de mon chemin ! » {n}Une femme richement vêtue, portant un grain de beauté artificiel au-dessus de la bouche, joue des coudes pour se frayer un chemin jusqu'à vous à travers la foule.{/n} « Noble {mf|seigneur|dame}, veuillez excuser ce jeune freluquet. Mon huitième fils ne sait plus ce qu'il dit ! Il a décidé de renoncer à sa famille, à son titre de noblesse et à ses talents de guérisseur, tout ça parce qu'il s'est entiché d'une souillon des niveaux intermédiaires ! Une union avec une roturière sonnerait le glas de ses études universitaires, mais je vous le demande un peu : Dargonus et l'Officio Medicae doivent-ils être privés d'un brillant chirurgeon pour une vulgaire amourette sans lendemain ? »
traits.speaker: AdministratumStrangeNobleLady

languages.text: "Aus dem Weg!" {n}Eine kostbar gekleidete Dame mit einer Schönheitsfleck-Augmentation über der Lippe schiebt die Umstehenden mit den Ellenbogen zur Seite und kommt auf dich zu.{/n} "{mf|Geschätzter Lord|Geschätzte Lady}, mein achter Sohn hat den Verstand verloren! Er will seiner Familie abschwören, seinem Adelstitel und seiner Gabe als Heiler, und das alles nur für eine zerlumpte Obdachlose aus den mittleren Ebenen! Eine Ehe mit einer Bürgerlichen wäre das Ende seines Universitätsstudiums – sollen Dargonus und das Officio Medicae wegen einer kurzzeitigen Liebelei einen fähigen Chirurgeum verlieren?"
languages.original_text: "Out of my way!" {n}Elbowing aside onlookers left and right, a richly dressed lady with a beauty mark augment above her lip charges toward you.{/n} "Esteemed {mf|lord|lady}, my eighth offspring has lost his mind! He has decided to renounce his family, his noble title, and his talent as a healer, all for the sake of some tattered waif from the middle levels! A union with a commoner will put an end to his studies at the university — but should Dargonus and the Officio Medicae be deprived of a capable chirurgeon because of a passing fancy?"

traits.locale_text: "Aus dem Weg!" {n}Eine kostbar gekleidete Dame mit einer Schönheitsfleck-Augmentation über der Lippe schiebt die Umstehenden mit den Ellenbogen zur Seite und kommt auf dich zu.{/n} "{mf|Geschätzter Lord|Geschätzte Lady}, mein achter Sohn hat den Verstand verloren! Er will seiner Familie abschwören, seinem Adelstitel und seiner Gabe als Heiler, und das alles nur für eine zerlumpte Obdachlose aus den mittleren Ebenen! Eine Ehe mit einer Bürgerlichen wäre das Ende seines Universitätsstudiums – sollen Dargonus und das Officio Medicae wegen einer kurzzeitigen Liebelei einen fähigen Chirurgeum verlieren?"
traits.speaker: AdministratumStrangeNobleLady

languages.text: "Çekilin önümden!" {n}Dudağının üstünde ogmentli bir güzellik beni olan, şatafatlı giyinmiş bir leydi; durup izleyenleri sağa sola itekleyerek sana hızla yaklaşıyor.{/n} "Sayın {mf|lordum|leydim}, sekizinci evladım aklını yitirmiş! Ailesinden, soylu ünvanından ve bir şifacı olarak hünerlerinden feragat etmeye karar vermiş, hem de orta seviyeden bakımsız, evsiz barksız bir karı için! Avamdan birisiyle evlenirse üniversitedeki eğitimi son bulur... Dargonus ve Officio Medicae, geçici bir hevese tutuldu diye yetenekli bir cerrahtan mahrum mu kalsın?"
languages.original_text: "Out of my way!" {n}Elbowing aside onlookers left and right, a richly dressed lady with a beauty mark augment above her lip charges toward you.{/n} "Esteemed {mf|lord|lady}, my eighth offspring has lost his mind! He has decided to renounce his family, his noble title, and his talent as a healer, all for the sake of some tattered waif from the middle levels! A union with a commoner will put an end to his studies at the university — but should Dargonus and the Officio Medicae be deprived of a capable chirurgeon because of a passing fancy?"

Ailesinden, soylu ünvanından ve bir şifacı olarak hünerlerinden feragat etmeye karar vermiş, hem de orta seviyeden bakımsız, evsiz barksız bir karı için! Avamdan birisiyle evlenirse üniversitedeki eğitimi son bulur... Dargonus ve Officio Medicae, geçici bir hevese tutuldu diye yetenekli bir cerrahtan mahrum mu kalsın?"
traits.speaker: AdministratumStrangeNobleLady
